snippet: State Senator Tony Avella of Queens did the right thing when he concluded that free tickets from the United States Tennis Association exceeded the state’s gift ban.
abstract: Editorial asserts that State Sen Tony Avella of Queens did the right thing when he concluded that the free tickets to tennis championships given to him by the United States Tennis Association exceeded the New York State's gift ban.
lead_paragraph: State Senator Tony Avella of Queens did the right thing when he concluded that free tickets from the United States Tennis Association exceeded the state’s gift ban.

headline.seo: A Freebie Too Far for Senator Avella
